file.name: beer-api.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Beer API
  description: The official Beer API!  Search for both beers and breweries.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /beers/{beerId}:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: A single beer.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Beer'
    put:
      requestBody:
        description: Updated beer information.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Beer'
        required: true
      responses:
        202:
          description: The beer was updated.
    delete:
      responses:
        204:
          description: The beer was deleted.
    parameters:
    - name: beerId
      in: path
      description: Unique ID of a beer.
      required: true
      schema:
        format: int32
        type: integer
  /breweries:
    get: {}
    post: {}
  /breweries/{breweryId}:
    get: {}
    put: {}
    delete: {}
  /breweries/{breweryId}/beers:
    get: {}
    post: {}
  /beers:
    get:
      summary: Get All Beers
      description: Returns all of the beers in the database.
      responses:
        200:
          description: All the beers!
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Beer'
    post:
      summary: Create a Beer
      description: Adds a single beer to the dataset.
      requestBody:
        description: The beer to add to the data set.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Beer'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: The beer was added.
components:
  schemas:
    Beer:
      title: Root Type for Beer
      description: The root of the Beer type's schema.
      required:
      - abv
      - id
      - name
      - style
      - breweryId
      - ounces
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        abv:
          format: double
          type: number
        ibu:
          format: double
          type: number
        name:
          type: string
        style:
          type: string
        breweryId:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        ounces:
          format: double
          type: number
    Brewery:
      title: Root Type for Brewery
      description: The root of the Brewery type's schema.
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
tags:
- name: beer
  description: null
- name: brewery
  description: null

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /breweries: get: responses: no responses
